body_html:
Ok, I will close this PR. It is truly regrettable that we have two separate and barely compatible logging mechanisms. I'm not sure whether this may change with absl?

@yilei will absl-py logging use absl C++ logging, and provide a single mechanism for verbosity?

body:
Ok, I will close this PR. It is truly regrettable that we have two separate and barely compatible logging mechanisms. I'm not sure whether this may change with absl? 

@yilei will absl-py logging use absl C++ logging, and provide a single mechanism for verbosity?
